website_summaries.verdict: The exceptional warranty make add to the value, and it's a reasonable choice for minor locking applications – but it's not tamper-proof.
pros: Offers a longer shackle than most in a solid brass construction
Lifetime warranty adds peace of mind should issues occur
cons: Won't stand up to bolt cutters if someone is determined to tamper with it
Rare occurrences of rust when used outdoors

customer_reviews.title: The length of this lock was a perfect fit for my new gate
customer_reviews.text: The length of this lock was a perfect fit for my new gate. You can tell that this is a very strong lock and will last for many years to come. I used to have a combination lock on my gate but got frustrated that the lock would get harder and harder to open. I should have gone to this style of lock a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Garbonzo

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit regular rubbermade container
customer_reviews.text: Strong , but this 2.5 inch shank will not fit my rubbermade container , unlike the photo examples . Perhaps their rubbermade container is a miniature ; mine is regular size and this lock is so tight it cannot be locked . Now I need to buy something with a longer shank . I gave it 2 stars because it is strong and can be used for something else .
customer_reviews.author: oldtora

customer_reviews.title: replacement
customer_reviews.text: replacing the old one just like it that had to be cut off because it would not open after leaving outside without use for 3 years in Northern Ohio. No visible rust on the one I cut off, so I will try to cover it before leaving it out any length of time in the future.
customer_reviews.author: North Coast Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well with the UPack trailer for blocking off the bulkhead.
customer_reviews.author: R Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Smooth operation and pretty to boot - great value!
customer_reviews.text: This lock seems like a great value. It's easy to lock/unlock with the two keys included. This wasn't critical for me but it also looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Tayne

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for securing gardening shed
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for the shed, not very strong. A cheap lock like this is just to kelp honest people honest and discourage the curious. This was made in china and the usual low quality. The keys can't be copied so don't lose one!
customer_reviews.author: nearoffutt

customer_reviews.title: Generic lock does the job for a low priority item to to steal.
customer_reviews.text: Good enough lock for protecting something not extremely desirable to thiefs. Probably not enough lock for high priority items.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: The name says it all
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty impressed with this lock. I bought two of them, one for my bike and one for my ATV, since I live in an area of thieving juvenile delinquents.
customer_reviews.author: Nate D.

customer_reviews.title: Good enough to lock the board to my truck or ...
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. I use it for my Hobie paddleboard (SUP). The board has a stainless steel pin made into the handle in the deck, for locking, and this padlock is just the right length to fit down into the handle and also have enough room to lock it to a steel cable. I would say it is a light to medium duty lock. Good enough to lock the board to my truck or storage rack.
customer_reviews.author: NickS.

customer_reviews.title: Light duty
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but I was expecting thicker 3/8" shackle not 1/4". Have another Brinks which hasheld up for years but can't say how tamper proof as the only theft I had they just cut the cable and did not mess with the lock. This is a light duty lock to keep honest people honest.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Needed this size and shape for U-Pack truck. Fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed this size and shape for U-Pack truck. Fit perfectly. Now on storage unit and seems tough enough. Is starting to rust however where the shank fits into lock.
customer_reviews.author: GooPonch

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: I was moving and needed this specifically sized lock shank to keep my possessions safe on the moving van. It worked well, just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: 10bac10

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Seems high quality. I use on a shed outside, and when it’s cold, it seems hard to turn the key to open it, but it hasn’t ever prevented me completely from opening it. Maybe some WD-40 would alleviate this?
customer_reviews.author: adam2323

customer_reviews.title: I'D BUY IT AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: A GREAT LOCK, USING IT ON MY SHED. LOOKS LIKE IT OUTLAST ALL THE OTHERS..
customer_reviews.author: PAULIE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs & inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: Got today. Two day delivery. As pictured. Perfect lock for my gate. Couldn't find "small" lock with "long" shackle at big box hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Sam (Portland, OR)

customer_reviews.title: Reliable for my bicycle.
customer_reviews.text: I use this with a Kryptonite cable to lock my bicycle. The long shaft makes it easy to work with and I can also slide it through my helmet strap in addition to the loops of the cable. Big and heavy, but so is the cable and they fit in my trunk rack bag.
customer_reviews.author: M. D.

customer_reviews.title: Came Apart Upon Unlocking
customer_reviews.text: The lock's core, pins and springs fell out of the lock the first time it was opened with the key. I was so mad that I threw it in the trash. Brinks may be good at security, but their quality control / quality assurance needs improvement. Now, I suppose I won't be able to get a replacement from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for Yeti cooler
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Yeti 75 pretty well. It is a little too long to lock the top b/c the lid can open ~1cm, but it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: lighter

customer_reviews.title: Smooth locking.  Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Smooth locking. Keys work easily. The long shank makes it work well on my workplace locker. Solid, not cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Strong....Maybe too Strong
customer_reviews.text: Lost the keys and tried to break this lock. I have huge 4' bolt cutters and it barely made a scratch. Thankfully I found a key and have since made a million copies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True security starts at home
customer_reviews.text: If security is a must,this is the way you keep all your valuables safe.
customer_reviews.author: derrow

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Dewalt Table Saw
customer_reviews.text: This affordable lock fits the power switch on my Dewalt DW745 10-Inch Compact Job-Site Table Saw. It's perfect for making sure that curious little hands can't experiment with the power tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Kopke

customer_reviews.title: Way thinner in real life than in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Way thinner in real life than in the picture. Quite useless for my house. Quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia

customer_reviews.title: Works great for locking our storage box
customer_reviews.text: We needed a 3 inch lock to lock up out simply storage storage box. They wanted to sell them for $20 a pop. This works great, and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: LVNmommy

customer_reviews.title: Too big to suitcase
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use it with a suitcase, but it is too big. I have no doubt of his quality, but I could not use it for what I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great little lock
customer_reviews.text: I needed a longer lock for a toolbox and this works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyoftwo

customer_reviews.title: NOT keyed alike but a good product.
customer_reviews.text: These locks are good quality but I wanted to point out that they are NOT keyed alike. If I had known I would not have purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: cookcooks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. Used it for a lab locker. Key fits smoothly and doesn't jam on you.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Elias

customer_reviews.title: good buy for yeti
customer_reviews.text: good stong lock but the u is actually 2 inches not 1 9/16"
customer_reviews.author: B_Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Good lock
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lock for my Pelican elite cooler and it works great. It's easy to lock, unlock, and appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jim 'Pablo' Wells

customer_reviews.title: They probably work fine but I needed them for a project and the ...
customer_reviews.text: They probably work fine but I needed them for a project and the lock pictured is not the same as what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: The lock looks nice, is easy to unlock
customer_reviews.text: The lock looks nice, is easy to unlock, and holds up well. It's a bit challenging to re-lock but it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great locker room lock
customer_reviews.text: Great security for the price. Well made. Thin enough to fit my Planet Fitness gym locker.
customer_reviews.author: Ron E

customer_reviews.title: Well made lock.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality lock. We use it on a shed and it has been doing it's job keeping things all locked up!
customer_reviews.author: KimmyC

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lock
customer_reviews.text: We are teaching our class to open and close different locks. This one is smooth opening and holds tight.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little lock for securing my boat trailer when parked at the boat ramp.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona / Montana Richard

customer_reviews.title: It's a lock that locks and unlocks
customer_reviews.text: It will secure your belongings but if someone shows up with a bolt cutters or shotgun, you can kiss the lock and whatever it is securing goodbye.
customer_reviews.author: M5

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Good price
customer_reviews.text: Hello. Good product. Good price. arrived as promised. Thank's Capitan
customer_reviews.author: Capitan Avi

customer_reviews.title: slim and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Nice slender lock-smooth mechanism - nice weight to it. comes with 2 keys. I use it on an outside gate, and expect that it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Value!!
customer_reviews.text: I lost this lock a while back and couldn't believe that I found it again.
customer_reviews.author: P.J.

customer_reviews.title: Yeti coolers.
customer_reviews.text: I got this lock for my Yeti Tundra 75 and it fit perfectly, much better than spending $60 for the Yeti Approved masterlock. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lexy

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect to lock up our crawl space. We're very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot at first but I'm using it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot at first but I'm using it for my backyard gate. It's getting a little bit of rust on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ting

customer_reviews.title: Defectivd
customer_reviews.text: Worked once. Lock wouldn't turn and key broke off in lock. Better off with different brand.
customer_reviews.author: michael brown jr

customer_reviews.title: Great lock, I use it on the gate to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great lock, I use it on the gate to my backyard. Works really well and fits perfectly on the latch.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: I thought they were fairly secure
customer_reviews.text: Stronger than expected from some of the reviews I saw. Did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Worthless lol lol a joke
customer_reviews.text: Worthless. I pulled them apart with a screwdriver. They are completely worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Dadbeh J

customer_reviews.title: Great Brinks quality
customer_reviews.text: Works outside in all weather conditions / should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: victor irl carlson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works just great just as advertised. I would recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: R Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, the shackle is thin but I needed it to be to lock up my deck box.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it so I can't tell you how it will weather outdoors but it locked up my deck box fine.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock
customer_reviews.text: Good for keeping people from coming in (or more importantly out) of the backyard. I like that it's long.
customer_reviews.author: Samaan

customer_reviews.title: Woudl not recommend this for outside use
customer_reviews.text: We used this for an outside gate, and it rusted after less than 2 months of use. It is now unusable because it does not close anymore. Woudl not recommend this for outside use; however, might be fine for indoor use.
customer_reviews.author: MSC

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It is outdoors so I hope to get ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It is outdoors so I hope to get a few good years out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Norwegies

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did its job. Stayed secure on a U-Pack storage cube from Chicago to Pittsburgh.
customer_reviews.author: BethanyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: good lock!
customer_reviews.text: Working very well on our gate so far. Glad we got it.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Brass good
customer_reviews.text: Got this specifically because it is brass to use on my boat trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good lock, I am using it for my shed door.
customer_reviews.text: Very good lock, I am using it for my shed door.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lock
customer_reviews.text: The locking mechanism seems sturdy. The lock and key are finely crafted.
customer_reviews.author: St1mpack

customer_reviews.title: The Brinks lock works great and matches all of the other padlocks we use ...
customer_reviews.text: The Brinks lock works great and matches all of the other padlocks we use for our fitness center. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday in snow weather... no rust or sticking, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nash615

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product and would definitely de omen it to everybody!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for side gate and pool box
customer_reviews.text: I needed a heavy duty option for outside. I have a pool gate, side gate and chemical box. My pool guy plus me and my wife all need access and we didn't want to have to carry around keys. These worked great and have survived the elements (124 degrees, wind and dust storms and rain). I live in the desert so I can't use the normal combo locks. That's a tough enviornment and needs a tough lock.
customer_reviews.author: Madtown

customer_reviews.title: Rusted and inoperable after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Rusted after using only a few months to secure the lock on our truck and now it doesn't open/close like it's supposed to. I thought it would last longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah G.

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for mY coolEr and iT works just fIne. And mY Exerience wiTh thIs cooler has been ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for mY coolEr and iT works just fIne. And mY Exerience wiTh thIs cooler has been great, although I won't name names out of respect for their brand of locks...
customer_reviews.author: CARush

customer_reviews.title: Not a deterrent for theives
customer_reviews.text: Well.... didn't last long. Someone with bolt cutters made sure of that. I imagine this would do better as an inside lock for something.
customer_reviews.author: big fan of castle

customer_reviews.title: I'm a little disappointed in this lock
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little disappointed in this lock. Granted, I'm a woman, and while I'm not exactly weak, I'm not particularly strong, either. It was fine for about two months, but after that, I couldn't get the shackle to lock/click in the body of of the lock; it simply stopped working. Accidentally, I applied pressure on the shackle before I had it lined up with the hole, and it clicked into place OUTSIDE of the hole. I'm not terribly worried about theft, and think it will work fine in this limited way, but I would much prefer it work properly. I'm sure the product, in general, is a fine one. I just got unlucky.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ott

customer_reviews.title: Bought for relocube, looks sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The lock looks sturdy, I bought it to go on my ABF Upack Relocube container. I will update here after the move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Brinks 161-42001 1-9/16-Inch 40mm Solid Brass Padlock with 2.5-Inch Shackle, 1-Pack
product_meta.description: This 40mm lock is constructed with a solid brass body and a 2.5" hardened steel, chrome plated shackle. This product is ideal for all 1-9/16" padlock applications where a longer shackle is required. As a global leader in security-related products and services, the BRINKS name is synonymous in top quality merchandise to keep you and your valuables safe. A credit to this tradition, our line of solid brass padlocks is designed to resist corrosion and provide years of trouble free operation.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars146 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
